name: Deep Soul
description:
Hello everyone, this is my project in ludum dare 41.

This time I want to combine turn-based game and the platform jumping game.So I did DeepSoul.

When you play this game, you will experience the triple experience of strategy games, turn-based games and platform jumping games.

However, I have to admit that there are some flaws in the tracking part of the character, but I will improve and optimize it gradually.

Press “Left” or “Right” to control the direction

If you are moving at the same time near the platform, you can press “The Space Bar” to reverse the character.

When you have completed the planned route, you can press “Enter” to complete this turn.

Thank you for playing my game.
